resources.string:
* PLEASE NOTE: Prices are only a general indication of toll fees. Always check your account


* Citylink and Eastlink Prices are valid until 31st March 2013.
This is what a road that you can select looks like.
This is what a road looks like after you select it.

Under Settings, you can change the view from a Map view to a text view, and you can also Select the type of vehicle you drive to further customize the toll report. Please note, if you have no data connection this app will still work, but only in the text view.
